lectures.title: Introduction to Python and Programming Mindset
lectures.transcript: Alright everyone, good morning. Before we even write our first line of Python code, I want you to understand how a programmer thinks. When I say Python is an interpreted language, what I really mean in practical terms is that you can experiment very quickly. Indentation in Python is not cosmetic. It defines blocks of logic and improves readability.

lectures.title: JavaScript Execution and Event Loop
lectures.transcript: JavaScript is single threaded but supports asynchronous execution using the event loop. The call stack, task queue and microtask queue together determine how callbacks are executed.

lectures.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
lectures.transcript: Machine learning is the study of algorithms that learn patterns from data. Supervised learning uses labeled examples, while unsupervised learning finds hidden structure in data.
